titles: The experienc'd angler, or, Angling improv'd being a general discourse of angling, imparting many of the aptest wayes and choicest experiments for the taking of most sorts of fish in pond or river.
author: Venables, Robert, 1612?-1687.
publisher: Printed for Richard Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
notes: Written by Robert Venables. Cf. BM.
Advertisements: p. [1] at beginning and p. 105.
